```{r setup, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
library(flexdashboard)
```

## Loading in data

I am loading in my instacart data, which will be used to make a flexdashboard of various visualizations of the data. 

I am cleaning the data by:

- using `select` to only include the variables of interest: product name, aisle, department, days since prior order, reordered, order id

```{r insta, message = FALSE}
data("instacart")

insta = instacart %>% 
  select()  %>% 
  filter(aisle %in% c("baking ingredients", "dog food care", "packaged vegetables fruits")) %>%
  group_by(aisle) %>% 
  count(product_name) %>% 
  mutate(rank = min_rank(desc(n))) %>% 
  arrange(desc(n)) 
```
